verses.name: 1 Corinthians 6:15
verses.text: Know ye not that your bodies are the members of Christ? shall I then take the members of Christ, and make them the members of an harlot? God forbid.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 6:16
verses.text: What? know ye not that he which is joined to an harlot is one body? for two, saith he, shall be one flesh.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 6:17
verses.text: But he that is joined unto the Lord is one spirit.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 6:18
verses.text: Flee fornication. Every sin that a man doeth is without the body; but he that committeth fornication sinneth against his own body.
